A

AutoCloseables - Class in software.leonov.io
A utility class for working with AutoCloseable instances.
AutoCloser - Class in software.leonov.io
An AutoCloseable that collects AutoCloseable resources and closes them all when it is closed.
AutoCloser() - Constructor for class software.leonov.io.AutoCloser
 

C

close() - Method in class software.leonov.io.AutoCloser
 
closeQuietly(AutoCloseable, Consumer<Throwable>) - Static method in class software.leonov.io.AutoCloseables
Closes an AutoCloseable resource, with explicit control over how to handle any error that may occur.

R

register(C) - Method in class software.leonov.io.AutoCloser
Registers the given AutoCloseable resource to be closed when this AutoCloser is closed.
rethrow(Throwable) - Method in class software.leonov.io.AutoCloser
Stores the given throwable and rethrows it as is if it is an Exception, RuntimeException or Error.

S

software.leonov.io - package software.leonov.io
Utility methods and classes for working with Java I/O.
